Name: Floruit - Earliest date
Description: This field is used to record the start date of the documented period of great activity/flourishing of the documented person.

Name: Floruit - Latest date
Description: This field is used to record the end date of the documented period of great activity/flourishing of the documented person.

Name: Floruit Location
Description: This field is used to record the place of the period of greatest activity/flourishing of the documented person.

Name: Field of Activity
Description: This field is used to record different activities which the documented person pursued during their existence/lifetime. Each individual field of activity should be documented separately so that it can be tracked individually.

Name: Period of Activity - Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest possible date of a period of activity which the documented person pursued during their existence/lifetime.

Name: Period of Activity - Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date of a period of activity which the documented person pursued during their existence/lifetime.

Name: Activity Location
Description: This field is used to record the place at which a period of activity in which the documented person had participated occurred.

Name: Educational Training
Description: This field is used to record the subject of the education of the documented person.
